Perceptor's shuttle/Sharpclaws's shuttle/Alecto's shuttle::

Perceptor's shuttle and Sharpclaws's left the battle following 
Killfest's.

Aelecto opened a comm link in a Predacon's frecuancy and said "Anyone 
need a shuttle???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/EndBringer/Firearm/Prowl/Scyther/Kluster/Grimmler/Fliq::
> 
> Killfest flies inside Astroblast, EndBringer entering behind him. 
> Killfest nods and takes the cube from Motormaster, inserting it 
into 
> Astroblast.
> 
> "The Maximals were much more organized than I had thought there. Or 
> rather there were much more of them than I anticipated," Killfest 
> says, looking out at the battlefield.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl smiles, seeing that the Predacons were leaving. "Good job, 
> guys!" he says into his comm to the other Maximals, "Lets head back 
> home."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster swears, feeling the shots hit the base. He motions for 
> Symphony to follow him and runs out of the base, looking at the 
> attackers.
> 
> "Don't they every give up?" he says to himself, taking out his 
> missile launcher and firing twice at Reflector. He taps his comm, 
> allerting Firearm of the attack.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm flies up beside Prowl, relaying the news of the attack on 
the 
> Cybertronian Fire. Prowl nods.
> 
> "Lets hurry," he says, "We'll need to get back to earth by 
ourselves."
> 
> The two bots boost off toward earth, nothing to carry them but 
their 
> jetpacks.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther gets in the shuttle, flying to Pinsir and opening the hatch 
> for him.
> 
> "Get in, we gotta hurry."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing that the battle was almost over, Grimmler and Fliq turn 
their 
> shuttle around, heading back toward the planet.
> 
> "If you need any further help, call us again," Grimmler says to 
Liono 
> over the comm as the shuttle flies back toward earth.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > OOC: I always use automatic guns.  Sorry if it seems extreme to 
> you, but its 
> > just how i battle.
> > 
> > :::Maximus Prime/The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
> > Lynx/Orion/Atma/Psuedo:::
> > 
> > ::My Maximals see that the battle is over.  Maximus Prime 
> separates.  Sky 
> > Lynx transforms into shuttle mode and Torca, Ratchet and 
Sideswipe 
> climb in, 
> > and he takes off.  The others get into shuttles and they all head 
> back to the 
> > CF::
> > ~~~~~
> > Psuedo: Well, its good that you had friends to keep you company.
> > Atma: How have you caused them trouble?
